<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Ghost Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=2281) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #163: Ruins of Gauntlight](/Sources.aspx?ID=71) pg. 81</row>

**Archetype** [Ghost Hunter](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=88)

**Prerequisites**
[Ghost Hunter Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2277)

</column>

---

Once per day, you can infuse a weapon you are carrying with magical energies that allow it to strike true against [incorporeal](/Traits.aspx?ID=222) [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160). The weapon gains the effects of the [_ghost touch_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=297) property rune for 10 minutes.

 At 10th level, you can apply this effect to two weapons instead of one.
name: Ghost Strike
